page.title: 19THE LIVE AID POP FESTIVAL
page.content: On the 13th of July on BBC 2 they had a Live Aid pop festival for the starving people of Africa.At first they showed you the pictures of the starving people of Etheopia. Then they had a pop festival staring singers from all over the world. People sent in hundreds of thousands of pounds. The festival lasted from noon Saturday until 4 am Sunday morning. Bob Geldorf is the man who orgainised it all. He started planning how to raise money for the starving Africans after a visit to Etheopia. He organised a record called "Feed the World" which raised several million pounds, then he went on to organise the Live Aid Concert. They hope this will eventually raise over forty million pounds.
